The Interknights

do something noble today

Digital technology - for the good of the realm

We make digital technology to create real world change.

What Shapes Us

Social entrepreneurship

Code opens us up to a whole new world, and brings us all new ways of improving the lives of others. We have a theory that when you commit to helping others, you help yourself along the way.

Collaboration

Being able to rely on oneself is important, but the possibilities multiply when you collaborate with others. We want to make communication as open as can be, and we hope to always work to grow and connect our communities.

Lifelong Learning

The world won't stop changing, so we'll keep learning. Growth is about always looking for ways to be better. No matter how much we improve, we can always continue to push our own boundaries forward.
